resources.string: To continue the process, you must agree to the rules. If you do not agree, cancel the verification process or close the window.
Please enter a valid website address!
Please enter a valid phone number!
Please select your utility bill provider from the list below
Enter your login information for your online utility account
Please enter valid credentials and try again!
We were not able to log you in…
Please select your desired authentication method from the options below
Please enter the captcha code you see in the picture below
Please enter the code you have received to your phone or by email
Please answer the question provided below
Please verify access through your provider\'s application
When you\'re done, press the continue button
Please enter the passcode you have set up with your utility provider
Please choose the country where your document was issued
Which document type would you want to identify?
Please have your **identity card** ready to identify
Please have your **passport** ready to identify
Please have your **residence permit** ready to identify
Please have your **driver\'s license** ready to identify
Please have your **document** ready to identify
Second proof of address document photo
You can upload photos in every step
Make sure you are in the bright environment
Click «I\'m Ready» when prompted and follow the instructions
You will need to move closer or away from the camera to complete this check
Make sure the picture of your selected document is:
Place your document to fit all angles into the frame:
Well lit and not Covered by a shadow
Not covered by the reflection of light/glare
Not blocked by a finger and fits the white frame
An original document and not a copy of it
Check if your device’s camera is clean, not blurry
Turn off the camera flash to prevent reflections
Ensure good lighting to avoid glare or shadow
Hold the document steadily without covering its data
Do not cover document corners with your fingers
Front of proof of age card
Back of proof of age card
Place your document into the frame and take a clear photo
Place your document into the frame and wait for it to be scanned
Which file type would you like to upload?
Make sure your selfie is clearly visible and fits the white frame
Make sure the light source is in front and not behind you
Make sure the picture of your selected document is: Clearly visible and NOT Blurry
Make sure the picture of your selected document is: Well lit and not Covered by a shadow
Make sure the picture of your selected document is: Not covered by the reflection of light/glare
Make sure the picture of your selected document is: Not blocked by a finger and fits the white frame
Check if your device’s camera is clean, not blurry
Turn off the camera flash to prevent reflections
Ensure good lighting to avoid glare or shadow
Hold the document steadily without covering its data
Do not cover document corners with your fingers
Press the capture button to record your document
Position your document to fit the moving frame
You’ve exceeded document recording time. Try again.
Front of proof of age card
Back of proof of age card
Is your **front of identity card** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **back of identity card** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **front of document** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **back of document** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **front of residence permit** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **back of residence permit** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **front of driver\'s license** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **back of driver\'s license** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **front of passport cover** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **proof of address** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **second proof of address** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **passport face page** clearly visible and in the frame?
clearly visible and in the frame?
Is the picture of your face clearly visible?
Can you clearly read the details of the document?
Is it the back of the document?
Can you clearly read the details of the document?
Can you clearly read the details of the document?
Are you sure you want to upload this file?
Place your face into the marked area and take a clear photo
Your face is outside the marked area
Perfect! Now take a clear photo
Is your face photo clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your **face photo** clearly visible and in the frame?
Is your face clearly visible and close enough for inspection?
Front of proof of age card
Back of proof of age card
Align uploaded photo into the marked area
Please select a file with a valid size no larger than 5MB
We were not able to upload the selected file. Please try again!
Please wait while we set things up for you!
Front of proof of age card
Back of proof of age card
Please make sure your document has machine-readable zone
Machine-readable zone (MRZ) usually consists of 2 (passport) or 3 (ID card) lines of symbols. MRZ example is presented in the image bellow, marked by a red rectangle.
Document not found. Make sure you are showing
Make sure your document issue country is
The following discrepancies may have occurred:
If you have any questions, please contact our customer support team
Your verification requires additional manual review. You will be notified of when the review will be completed.
It usually takes from 1 to 5 minutes to receive your results
Are you sure you want to abort verification?
We could not confirm your identity
We need to use your camera to take the photo of your document and face photo
Go to settings, tap on \"Permissions\" to grant access to the camera
Touch the middle of the passport to the top of the phone
Touch the middle of the ID card to the top of the phone
Touch the middle of the document to the top of the phone
NFC is unavailable or unreadable with your document. Please try again.
Please move the phone away from the document!
Please enable NFC in device settings before continuing
Your device does not support NFC. For further support, please contact
Touch the middle of the passport to the top of the phone
Touch the middle of the ID card to the top of the phone
Touch the middle of the document to the top of the phone
Connection interrupted. Please move the phone closer!
Please use a mobile phone with built-in NFC tag reader
Are you sure you want to abort verification?
You have canceled the verification process
The verification process was not performed. If you have any questions, please contact our customer support team.
Connection issues. Please make sure you have stable internet connection
Experiencing slow or unstable internet. Please be patient as this may cause delays
You have **3** attempts to authenticate yourself!
Follow the steps prompted on the screen and ensure a well-lit environment. Try to avoid: blur, shadow, glare, fingers, or other objects in the photo.
Face verification was not successful. Follow the steps prompted on the screen and ensure a well-lit environment. Try to avoid: blur, shadow, glare, fingers, or other objects in the photo.
Are you sure you want to cancel face authentication?
Please hold steady and look straight ahead!
Perfect! Please wait a couple of seconds while we analyse your information.
You’ll be redirected to your selected bank’s login page to securely verify your account.
My bank is not listed here
My bank is not listed here
If your bank isn’t listed, select this option to proceed to the next step without verification.
I agree to share my bank details with the party requesting verification
Your bank verification was successful. You can now proceed to the next step.
Your bank verification was unsuccessful. Please try again or try another bank.
